common_0140_voice1_rival_01:
Hey, what’s that Pokémon in front of you?!
It looks SUPER strong![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0140_voice1_rival_02:
Kinda seems like it’s waiting for you...
Does it want you to follow it?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0140_voice2_rival_02:
That Pokémon might be as strong as mine!
Maybe stronger![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0140_voice3_rival_01:
Hey, heads up—some pretty rough and rowdy
Houndour live in this cave![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0140_voice3_rival_02:
I’m glad you’ve got your bodyguard, but watch
your back! They’re strong![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0140_voice4_rival_01:
Oh my gosh, it straight up pulverized that rock!
How powerful even IS it?![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0140_voice4_rival_02:
I wonder what that move was. Man, I wanna
see it up close![VAR 0114(0004)]
